readme:
# WebDeveloper-Light Atom Syntax Theme

![screen shot 2016-02-28 at 9 29 15 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1791050/13386561/8d58ff7e-de62-11e5-80de-a4d8563aeea5.png)

## Features
- Increases font size of tabs, project tree, and status-bar.
- Low contrast to reduce eye fatigue.
- Will supported syntax: PHP, HTML, Blade, JavaScript, and Vue Components (.vue) (work in progress).
